message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section at the bottom. Within this section, there is a line item labeled "Beginning Balance" which represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

The value for "Beginning Balance" is shown as 8000000.00.

Therefore, the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
